game.name: Monster Girl Therapy
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Remote Play TV, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Save the monster girls! Talk through their issues and face their challenges. Convince them to leave their crumbling fantasy game before it all falls apart! You may yet come to understand them—or even yourself!—in this wholesome mix of playful conversation and minigames.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Save the monster girls! Talk through their issues and face their challenges. Convince them to leave their crumbling fantasy game before it all falls apart! You may yet come to understand them—or even yourself!—in this wholesome mix of playful conversation and minigames.
